Bio: Jonya Chen is a senior from Ithaca, NY, studying Electrical & Computer Engineering with a minor in Computer Science. She is the current regent for the Kappa Delta chapter of Theta Tau. Her previous work experience includes hardware validation at Intel Corporation and software development at Microsoft. Other than Theta Tau, on campus, Jonya is involved in SWE (Society of Women Engineers), IEEE (ECE student group), Cornell Engineering Ambassadors, and Alpha Epsilon Phi sorority. In her free time, she likes to travel, watch movies, and eat lots of new, exciting food!

Hi my name is Adrian and I am a senior studying Operations Research and Engineering and minoring in Computer Science and Business. I am the Treasurer for Theta Tau and I am in the Zeta pledge class. I interned at BlackRock last summer and on campus I am involved in Pi Kappa Phi, Cornell Alpha Fund and Cornell Club Swimming.
